title: Let's play spot the copyright infringement! Ready... Go!
body:
Everyone, I'd like you to meet the **completely original characters;** Arshe (EDIT: apparently her name is actually "Icey"), Burnd, and Erzeal (comes with a free WaveCannon Erzeal skin!).

Like many popular titles, League of Legends has been copied by some chinese 'developer' and turned into a mobile phone game. Get this: It's called "_Summoner's Alliance_". Really? Even the name is unoriginal.

It's not the only example of this out there, "_Summoner's War_" actually has gameplay footage of a fight where the Boss is just a recolored version of {{champion:40}}. Like for real?

Look at these names! Galen, Jarven, Zhao Yun! For the most part, it's just one letter being changed so it's not blatant. Hell they even use DEMACIA because they weren't clever enough to think of an alternative!

Everything about this 'game' is bullshit. The Ashe-character (name is Icey) has a description that literally reads; "She is rumored to use ice arrows...". Ho-Lee-Fuck. At least put some effort into your blatant plagiarism! 

Out of curiosity, I downloaded the app to see how bad it was. The voice acting is hilariously horrendous because it's entirely composed of half-chinese infused broken english. I can feel my soul writhing in agony every second I have it open. The first item you get is a goddamn Doran's Shield, same name and same sprite as in League.

Want to know the best part? They go the whole iPhone freemium strategy, you can buy 'heroes' and items for RL cash. Downright pathetic.

Can someone from Riot confirm these jerkoffs are being sued into the next dimension?

replies.body: Is there a guy named Daaaaaaaaaaaaarvan?
Another one is called "League Of Angels". Look it's Janna
to be fair, she is really generic for a female wind type character, but I do see your point :p
I Agree with Blue on this one, and also quite a few differences here.like the hair style and the costume looks to be somwehat its own, but like blue said shes very generic for this type of character.
Does this help?
Their ads are horrible, but I hear the game itself is quite different.
From what I heard, it's basically doing nothing.
hey look, {{champion:13}} got a shave and grew out his hair :D ... strange way to spell "legends" though :P

I think I'll take this time to bring to attention that League of Angels took the dive.  You know how city-building games usually have slutty, scantily clad, women on their adds to draw in horny gamers?  League of Angles literally just has nude women.  Literally, no clothes, on their ads (for certain websites that I visited for research purposes).

That was simultaneously one of the funniest and saddest things I've seen in recent memory.  I didn't dwell on it because I was busy researching stuff, but it definitely left me shaking my head (pun not intended).

> (for certain websites that I visited for research purposes).

http://www.nyoozee.com/nyz-content/uploads/2015/03/mr-bean-updatec.com_.jpg

>left me shaking my head

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
League of Angels really doesn't have anything that really rips off LoL. Everyone looks at the name and just automatically assumes that's what they're doing.

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEzuKHc2,comment-id=00000004,timestamp=2015-07-26T22:30:05.226+0000)
>
> League of Angels really doesn't have anything that really rips off LoL. Everyone looks at the name and just automatically assumes that's what they're doing.

What most people don't know is that League of Legends is just a rip off of the League of Extraordinary Gentlemen which is a small scale rip off of the League of nations which ripped off my 7th grade science fair project about the solar system.  So pretty much, you're welcome.
Aside from...you know...the blatant plagiarism in all of their ads?  They don't only rip off LoL in their adds,  I've seen some with DoTA characters.
i think that's a better version of janna, imo

> [{quoted}](name=Lights And Magic,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEzuKHc2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-26T18:45:00.530+0000)
>
> Another one is called "League Of Angels". Look it's Janna

League of Angels is completely different. That character only bears a resemblance to Janna, that's as far as it goes.

That game has summoners though, so obviously it's not league. :3
Made me laugh then made me sad
I beg to differ. :(
Guys, this should be really obvious by now but since you apparently dont know by now, there is quite literally no copyright infringement in china..
Ugh. All of these cheap knockoffs are *jarven* me crazy.
i galentee that wont be the end of it
On the ap page its description clearly says its an "LoL" parody/themed gamed.
I really hate it when people copy other peoples work, Riot should sue the fuck out of these people.
It would do basically nothing, suing a company in china for copyright infringement would only make them laugh.

Wasn't League inspired by the original DotA?

But true fact: League > Dota

Another true fact: Valve > Riot
One thing is inspiring, another thing is stealing their names and Pulsefire Ezreal. That's just blantantly obvious.

League was inspired by DOTA, but it should be noted Guinsoo was one of the developers of the Allstars variant that IceFrog later took over and which eventually became the DOTA2 people play now.

So the game shown here, isn't really comparable to league at all.

- creativity nerfed

"to separate the good artist from the great ones"
Look through Dotas character roster, you may not feel so bad for league having to deal with knockoffs afterwards.
Galen the damecia mighty is my favorite hero from Summoner's Alliance
Wait that game actually looks fun though. Now I want Rito to make an app with chibi characters XD

Summoners war? I play that game... It has nothing to do with league o_o 
It has unique content that has NOTHING to do with Janna or League in general. 

Can you show me it the picture? o.o 

Summoners war is a turn based rpg with monsters. I don't see how Janna would fit into this, not to mention the company (com2us) is pretty well known for mobile games
Fuck Zhao Yun

> [{quoted}](name=Kicking,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EEzuKHc2,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-26T18:21:46.772+0000)
>
> Zhao Yun

He was actually a historical person, with a more known role in the novel "Romance of Three Kingdoms" and the popular Video Game series called "Dynasty Warriors". Xin Zhao is actually based on Zhao Yun and even have a skin in which he looks exactly as portayed in Dynasty Warriors series (Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao). So, that's not realy a copyright infringement.

Taric's name is Gaylord...
And Lucian's is... Obama?

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-R0h-5fYGJrc/UBKNTq32dzI/AAAAAAAADmk/qqywqfOxk1s/s1600/pikachu+gameboy+confused.gif
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/RHbOjONv-how-has-riot-not-noticed-this-game?show=flat&page=2
I admit one of the characters in Summoners War looks a bit like Janna, but it isn't really all that similar.
